snippet: Women seeking abortions in Florida will be required to make two visits to a clinic, with a mandatory 24-hour waiting period in between.
abstract: Florida Gov Rick Scott signs measure requiring women seeking abortions to make two visits to clinic with mandatory 24-hour waiting period in between.
lead_paragraph: Women seeking abortions in Florida will be required to make two visits to a clinic, with a mandatory 24-hour waiting period in between.

headline.main: Florida: Governor Signs Law Requiring 24-Hour Wait for Abortion
headline.print_headline: Florida: Governor Signs Law Requiring 24-Hour Wait for Abortion
